name: insert_into_table
description: Insert values into a specified SQLite table. If the table does not exist, it will be automatically created with the specified columns.

database_path.description: The path to the SQLite database file.

table_name.description: The name of the table to insert values into. If the table does not exist, it will be created.

columns.description: A list of column names to insert values into. These columns will also be used to define the table schema if the table is created.

values.description: A list of values to insert into the specified columns. The order must match the columns list.
